pr_title: API: move NaN validation from Expressions to Literals

timeline.message: API: move NaN validation from Expressions to Literals

timeline.bodyText: Looks like the verb is missing. It should be "Cannot create expression literal from NaN".
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Yes, sorry should have double checked... I include the fix of this in #1857 since I think they are kind of related, but please let me know if you want a separate PR for that!
replies.author: yyanyy
